entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
